author: pquerna
msg: Add support for RFC 5077 TLS Session tickets.  This adds two new directives:
* SSLTicketKeyFile: To store the private information for the encryption of the ticket.
* SSLTicketKeyDefault To set the default, otherwise the first listed token is used.  This enables key rotation across servers.

author: jbonofre
msg: [KARAF-974] Tightening up of cave:remove-repository and cave:register-repository commands

author: gsmith
msg: since mod_ssl.h is now included, tell compiler where to find it
